subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Preakness Stakes
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: The agreement promises more than 25 hours of Triple Crown coverage, including the Black-Eyed Susan Stakes, and other Preakness day and Belmont day programming on Versus.
snippet: The agreement promises more than 25 hours of Triple Crown coverage, including the Black-Eyed Susan Stakes, and other Preakness day and Belmont day programming on Versus.
